strings.EQUIPMENT_BFG_DESC: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage. Explosion Proc: 1 | Sparks Proc: 0.16Base Cooldown: 140sStacking Info35 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 31 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_BLACKHOLE_DESC: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds. Base Cooldown: 60sStacking Info11 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 8 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_BOSSHUNTERCONSUMED_DESC:
Looks kinda cool, but that's about it.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 60s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_BOSSHUNTER_DESC:
<style=cIsDamage>Execute</style> any enemy capable of spawning a <style=cIsDamage>unique reward</style>, and it will drop that <style=cIsDamage>item</style>. Equipment is <style=cIsUtility>consumed</style> on use.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 0s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_BURNNEARBY_DESC: Ignite ALL characters within 15m. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies. Base Cooldown: 45sStacking Info9 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 5 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_CLEANSE_DESC: Cleanse all negative effects.Includes debuffs, damage over time, stuns, freezes, and nearby projectiles. Base Cooldown: 20sStacking Info23+ Fuel Cells = Near 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 20+ Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = Near 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_COMMANDMISSILE_DESC:
Fire a swarm of <style=cIsDamage>12</style> missiles that deal <style=cIsDamage>12x300% damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style><style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 45s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_CRIPPLEWARD_DESC:
<color=#FF7F7F>ALL</color> characters within are <style=cIsUtility>slowed by 50%</style> and have their <style=cIsDamage>armor reduced by 20</style>. Can place up to <style=cIsUtility>5</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 15s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_CRITONUSE_DESC: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds. Base Cooldown: 60sStacking Info13 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 10 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_DEATHPROJECTILE_DESC: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds. Base Cooldown: 45sStacking Info11 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 8 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_DRONEBACKUP_DESC: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds. Base Cooldown: 100sStacking Info9 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 6 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_FIREBALLDASH_DESC: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage. Proc: 1Base Cooldown: 30sStacking Info11 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 8 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_FRUIT_DESC:
Instantly heal for <style=cIsHealing>50% of your maximum health</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 45s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_GAINARMOR_DESC: Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds. Base Cooldown: 45sStacking Info14 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 11 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_GATEWAY_DESC: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds. Base Cooldown: 45sStacking Info3 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 1 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_GOLDGAT_DESC:
Fires a continuous barrage that deals <style=cIsDamage>100% damage per bullet</style>. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style><style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: N/A</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_GUMMYCLONE_DESC: Spawn a gummy clone that has 300% damage and 300% health. Expires in 30 seconds. Base Cooldown: 100sStacking Info8 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 5 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_HEALANDREVIVECONSUMED_DESC:
Plant a sprout at the target location which drops <style=cIsHealing>healing orbs</style> that heals for <style=cIsHealing>2% life</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 15s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_HEALANDREVIVE_DESC:
<style=cIsHealing>Revive</style> <style=cIsUtility>dead, friendly Survivors</style> upon activation. <style=cIsUtility>Dying</style> while holding this equipment <style=cIsHealing>returns only you to life</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Reviving</style> gives <style=cIsHealing>3s of invulnerability</style> and <style=cIsUtility>consumes</style> the equipment.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 60s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_JETPACK_DESC: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration. Base Cooldown: 60sStacking Info9 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 6 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_LIFESTEALONHIT_DESC: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds. Base Cooldown: 60sStacking Info13 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 10 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_LIGHTNING_DESC:
Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing <style=cIsDamage>3000% damage</style> and <style=cIsDamage>stunning</style> nearby monsters.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style><style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 20s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_METEOR_DESC: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds. Proc: 1Base Cooldown: 140sStacking Info12 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 9 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_MOLOTOV_DESC:
Throw <style=cIsDamage>6</style> molotov cocktails that <style=cIsDamage>ignites</style> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>500% base damage</style>. Each molotov leaves a burning area for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage per second</style>. Lasts <style=cIsDamage>7s</style></style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Explosion Proc: 1 | Fire Proc: 0.5</style><style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 45s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_MULTISHOPCARD_DESC:
Whenever you make a gold purchase, get <style=cIsUtility>10%</style> of the spent gold back. If the purchase is a <style=cIsUtility>multishop</style> terminal, the other terminals will <style=cIsUtility>remain open</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 0.1s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_PASSIVEHEALING_DESC:
Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals a friendly target for <style=cIsHealing>10% of their maximum health</style> instantly, then <style=cIsHealing>1.5% of your maximum health</style> every second. 

Activating the equipment assigns a new target, or yourself if there are no targets available.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 15s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_RECYCLER_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Transform</style> an Item or Equipment into a different one. <style=cIsUtility>Can only be converted into the same tier one time</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 45s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_SAWMERANG_DESC:
Throw <style=cIsDamage>three large saw blades</style> that slice through enemies for <style=cIsDamage>3x400%</style> damage. Also deals an additional <style=cIsDamage>3x100% damage per second</style> while <style=cIsDamage>bleeding</style> enemies. Can <style=cIsDamage>strike</style> enemies again on the way back.
<style=cKeywordName>Direct Hit Proc: 1 | Bleed Proc: 0.2</style><style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 45s</style>
strings.EQUIPMENT_SCANNER_DESC: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds. Base Cooldown: 45sStacking Info10 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 6 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_TEAMWARCRY_DESC: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%. Base Cooldown: 45sStacking Info12 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 9 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_TONIC_DESC: Drink the Tonic, gaining the following multiplicative boosts for 20 seconds: 1.5x max health, 1.5x max shield, 1.7x attack speed, 1.3x movement speed, +20 armor, 2x base damage, 4x health regeneration. When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack). Base Cooldown: 60sStacking Info7 Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime OR if the player has Gesture of the Drowned: 4 Gesture of the Drowned/Fuel Cells = 100%+ uptime
strings.EQUIPMENT_VENDINGMACHINE_DESC:
Request an <style=cIsDamage>Eclipse Zero Vending Machine</style> from the <style=cIsDamage>UES Safe Travels</style>. Delivery guaranteed in <style=cIsUtility>5 seconds</style>, dealing <style=cIsDamage>2000% damage</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heal</style> up to 3 targets for <style=cIsHealing>25% of their maximum health</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style><style=cKeywordName>Base Cooldown: 60s</style>
strings.ITEM_ALIENHEAD_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Reduce skill cooldowns</style> by <style=cIsUtility>25%</style> <style=cStack>(+25% per stack, Exponential)</style>.

<style=cKeywordName>Stacking Info</style><style=cSub><style=cStack>2 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>43.8%</style>
<style=cStack>5 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>76.3%</style>
<style=cStack>10 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>94.4%</style>
strings.ITEM_ARMORREDUCTIONONHIT_DESC: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack, Linear) seconds. Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the Duration of the armor reduction buildup dealt by this item. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 2 Seconds into 1 Second.
strings.ITEM_ATTACKSPEEDANDMOVESPEED_DESC:
Increases <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style> by <style=cIsDamage>7.5%</style> <style=cStack>(+7.5% per stack, Linear)</style> and <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>7%</style> <style=cStack>(+7% per stack, Linear)</style>.

<style=cKeywordName>Stacking Info</style><style=cSub>At <style=cStack>2 Stacks</style>, <style=cIsDamage>Mocha</style> is equal to having <style=cStack>1</style> <style=cIsDamage>Paul's Goat Hoof</style> and <style=cStack>1</style> <style=cIsDamage>Soldier's Syringe</style>.</style>
strings.ITEM_ATTACKSPEEDONCRIT_DESC: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack, Linear) attack speed. Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the duration of attack speed on crit received by this item. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 3 Seconds into 1.5 Seconds.
strings.ITEM_AUTOCASTEQUIPMENT_DESC: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack, Exponential). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown. Stacking Info3 Stacks = 63.9% 5 Stacks = 73.9% 10 Stacks = 88.4% Include Fuel Cells in stacking count.
strings.ITEM_BANDOLIER_DESC: 18% (+10% per stack, Special) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns. Stacking Info5 Stacks = 44.6% 10 Stacks = 54.7% 20 Stacks = 63.4% The above assumes a Proc Coefficient of 1.0 triggers the event. Special Stacking Formula1 - 1 / (1 + stacks) ^ 0.33.
strings.ITEM_BARRAGEONBOSS_DESC: During boss events, <style=cIsUtility>5</style> missiles bombard the area, dealing <style=cIsDamage>2.5% <style=cStack>(+2.5% per stack, Linear)</style> of boss' Max Health in damage</style>. Before the boss event, gain additional missiles, up to a maximum of <style=cIsUtility>20</style> <style=cStack>(+5 per stack, Linear)</style>, per <style=cIsUtility>50</style> gold gained. <style=cIsUtility>Gold requirement scales over time.</style>
strings.ITEM_BARRIERONKILL_DESC: Gain a <style=cIsHealing>temporary barrier</style> on kill for <style=cIsHealing>15 health <style=cStack>(+15 per stack, Linear)</style></style>.
strings.ITEM_BARRIERONOVERHEAL_DESC: Healing past full grants you a <style=cIsHealing>temporary barrier</style> for <style=cIsHealing>50% <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Linear)</style></style> of the amount you <style=cIsHealing>healed</style>.
strings.ITEM_BEARVOID_DESC: Blocks incoming damage once. Recharges after 15 seconds (-10% per stack, Hyperbolic). Corrupts all Tougher Times. Stacking Info5 Stacks = 8.857 Seconds 10 Stacks = 5.230 Seconds 25 Stacks = 1.077 Seconds The minimum cooldown is 1 frame, achieved with at least 65 stacks.
strings.ITEM_BEAR_DESC:
<style=cIsHealing>15%</style> <style=cStack>(+15% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style> chance to <style=cIsHealing>block</style> incoming damage. <style=cIsUtility>Unaffected by luck</style>.

<style=cKeywordName>Stacking Info</style><style=cSub><style=cStack>7 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>51.2%</style>
<style=cStack>20 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>75%</style>
<style=cStack>40 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>85.7%</style></style>
strings.ITEM_BEETLEGLAND_DESC:
Every 30 seconds, <style=cIsUtility>summon a Beetle Guard</style> with bonus <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> damage and <style=cIsHealing>100% health</style>. Can have up to <style=cIsUtility>1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> Guards at a time.
<style=cKeywordName>Currently bugged, spawns immediately upon death</style>
strings.ITEM_BEHEMOTH_DESC: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+2.5m per stack, Linear) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies. Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the explosion's radius done by this item. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 4m into 2m.
strings.ITEM_BLEEDONHITANDEXPLODE_DESC:
Gain <style=cIsDamage>5% critical chance</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Critical Strikes bleed</style> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>240%</style> base damage. <style=cIsDamage>Bleeding</style> enemies <style=cIsDamage>explode</style> on death for <style=cIsDamage>400%</style> <style=cStack>(+400% per stack, Linear)</style> damage, plus an additional <style=cIsDamage>15%</style> <style=cStack>(+15% per stack, Linear)</style> of their maximum health.
<style=cKeywordName>Explosion Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_BLEEDONHITVOID_DESC:
<style=cIsDamage>10%</style> <style=cStack>(+10% per stack, Linear)</style> chance to <style=cIsDamage>collapse</style> an enemy for <style=cIsDamage>400%</style> base damage. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Tri-Tip Daggers</style>.

<style=cKeywordName>Collapse Info</style>3 seconds after the first stack is applied, deals <style=cIsDamage>400%</style> damage per stack and removes all stacks.
strings.ITEM_BLEEDONHIT_DESC: 10% (+10% per stack, Linear) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage. Stacking Info10 Stacks result in 100% chance to apply The above assumes a Proc Coefficient of 1.0 triggers the event. Proc Coefficient EffectsBleed total damage is affected by the Proc Coefficient of the damage that dealt it. Bleed Duration = 3 Seconds * Proc
strings.ITEM_BONUSGOLDPACKONKILL_DESC: 4% (+4% per stack, Linear) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth gold equal to the cost of a Small Chest. Scales with chests. Stacking Info25 Stacks result in 100% chance to drop gold The above assumes a Proc Coefficient of 1.0 triggers the event.
strings.ITEM_BOOSTALLSTATS_DESC: Grants <style=cIsUtility>4%</style> increase to <style=cIsUtility>ALL stats</style> for each buff, up to a maximum of <style=cIsUtility>4</style> <style=cStack>(+4 per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_BOSSDAMAGEBONUS_DESC: Deal an additional <style=cIsDamage>20%</style> damage <style=cStack>(+20% per stack, Linear)</style> to bosses.
strings.ITEM_BOUNCENEARBY_DESC: 20% (+20% per stack, Hyperbolic) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack, Linear) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage. Proc: 0.33 Stacking Info2 Stacks = 28.6% chance 5 Stacks = 50% chance 10 Stacks = 66.6% chance The above assumes a Proc Coefficient of 1.0 triggers the event.
strings.ITEM_CAPTAINDEFENSEMATRIX_DESC: Shoot down <style=cIsDamage>1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> projectiles within <style=cIsDamage>20m</style> every <style=cIsDamage>0.5 seconds</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Recharge rate scales with attack speed</style>.
strings.ITEM_CHAINLIGHTNINGVOID_DESC:
<style=cIsDamage>25%</style> chance to fire <style=cIsDamage>lightning</style> for <style=cIsDamage>60%</style> TOTAL damage up to <style=cIsDamage>3 <style=cStack>(+3 per stack, Linear)</style></style> times. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Ukuleles</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.2</style>
strings.ITEM_CHAINLIGHTNING_DESC: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack, Linear) targets within 20m (+2m per stack, Linear). Proc: 0.2 Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the chance to activate this item on hit. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 25% Chance into 12.5% Chance.
strings.ITEM_CLOVERVOID_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Upgrades 3</style> <style=cStack>(+3 per stack, Linear)</style> random items to items of the next <style=cIsUtility>higher rarity</style> at the <style=cIsUtility>start of each stage</style>. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all 57 Leaf Clovers</style>.
strings.ITEM_CLOVER_DESC:
All random effects are rolled <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style>times for a <style=cIsUtility>favorable outcome</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>This behaves in the same way as Advantage Rolls in D&D, however there is no cap to the amount extra die that can be rolled, thus stacks of this item = the number of extra die rolls. Advantage (<style=cIsHealth>57 Leaf Clover</style>) and Disadvantage (<style=cIsLunar>Purity</style>) cancel eachother out.</style>
strings.ITEM_CRITDAMAGE_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Critical Strikes</style> deal an additional <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style><style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_CRITGLASSESVOID_DESC: Your attacks have a <style=cIsDamage>0.5%</style> <style=cStack>(+0.5% per stack, Linear)</style> chance to <style=cIsDamage>instantly kill</style> a <style=cIsDamage>non-boss enemy</style>. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Lens-Maker's Glasses</style>.
strings.ITEM_CRITGLASSES_DESC: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack, Linear) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage. Stacking Info10 Stacks result in 100% chance to apply Proc Coefficient does NOT affect this item, and it always acts as a 1.0 Proc Coefficient. Railgunner EffectsRailgunner is not affected by the effective stacking cap of 10 as this item would instead increase her critical strike damage by 10%.
strings.ITEM_CROWBAR_DESC: Deal <style=cIsDamage>+75%</style> <style=cStack>(+75% per stack, Linear)</style> damage to enemies above <style=cIsDamage>90% health</style>.
strings.ITEM_DAGGER_DESC:
Killing an enemy fires out <style=cIsDamage>3</style> <style=cIsDamage>homing daggers</style> that deal <style=cIsDamage>150%</style> <style=cStack>(+150% per stack, Linear)</style> base damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_DEATHMARK_DESC: Enemies with <style=cIsDamage>4</style> or more debuffs are <style=cIsDamage>marked for death</style>, increasing damage taken by <style=cIsDamage>50%</style> from all sources for <style=cIsUtility>7</style> <style=cStack>(+7 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
strings.ITEM_DELAYEDDAMAGE_DESC: The next source of damage is <style=cIsHealing>reduced</style> by <style=cIsHealing>20%</style> and <style=cIsHealing>spread</style> into <style=cIsUtility>3 <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> hits</style>. All echoed damage is <style=cIsUtility>non-lethal</style> except for the final hit. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>15s</style>.
strings.ITEM_DRONEWEAPONS_DESC:
Gain <style=cIsDamage>Col. Droneman</style>. 
Drones gain <style=cIsDamage>+50%</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Linear)</style> attack speed and cooldown reduction. 
Drones gain <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> chance to fire a <style=cIsDamage>missile</style> on hit, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> TOTAL damage. 
Drones gain an <style=cIsDamage>automatic chain gun</style> that deals <style=cIsDamage>6x100%</style> damage, bouncing to <style=cIsDamage>2</style> enemies.
strings.ITEM_ELEMENTALRINGVOID_DESC:
Hits that deal <style=cIsDamage>more than 400% damage</style> also fire a black hole that <style=cIsUtility>draws enemies within 15m into its center</style>. Lasts <style=cIsUtility>5</style> seconds before collapsing, dealing <style=cIsDamage>100%</style> <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style> TOTAL damage. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>20</style> seconds. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Runald's and Kjaro's Bands</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_ENERGIZEDONEQUIPMENTUSE_DESC: Activating your Equipment gives you <style=cIsDamage>+70% attack speed</style> for <style=cIsDamage>8s</style> <style=cStack>(+4s per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_EQUIPMENTMAGAZINEVOID_DESC: Add <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> charge of your <style=cIsUtility>Special skill</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Reduces Special skill cooldown</style> by <style=cIsUtility>33%</style>. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Fuel Cells.</style>.
strings.ITEM_EQUIPMENTMAGAZINE_DESC: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack, Linear). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack, Exponential). Stacking Info3 Stacks = 38.6% 5 Stacks = 55.6% 10 Stacks = 80.3% If the player has Gesture of the Drowned, refer to that chart instead.
strings.ITEM_EXECUTELOWHEALTHELITE_DESC: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack, Hyperbolic) health. Stacking Info2 Stacks = 20.6% 8 Stacks = 51% 20 Stacks = 72.2% The above assumes a Proc Coefficient of 1.0 triggers the event.
strings.ITEM_EXPLODEONDEATHVOID_DESC:
Upon hitting an enemy at or above <style=cIsDamage>100% health</style>, <style=cIsDamage>detonate</style> them in a <style=cIsDamage>12m</style> <style=cStack>(+2.4m per stack, Linear)</style> radius burst for <style=cIsDamage>260%</style> <style=cStack>(+156% per stack, Linear)</style> base damage. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Will-o'-the-wisps</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_EXPLODEONDEATH_DESC:
On killing an enemy, spawn a <style=cIsDamage>lava pillar</style> in a <style=cIsDamage>12m</style> <style=cStack>(+2.4m per stack, Linear)</style> radius for <style=cIsDamage>350%</style> <style=cStack>(+280% per stack, Linear)</style> base damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_EXTRASHRINEITEM_DESC: On Shrine of Chance success, <style=cIsUtility>40%</style> <style=cStack>(+10% per stack, Linear)</style> chance to get higher rarity items.
strings.ITEM_EXTRASTATSONLEVELUP_DESC: Grows by gaining experience, storing <style=cIsUtility>20%</style> <style=cStack>(+5% per stack, Linear)</style> bonus stats (<style=cIsHealing>health</style>, <style=cIsHealing>regeneration</style>, and <style=cIsDamage>damage</style>). On removal, gain all stored stats.
strings.ITEM_FALLBOOTS_DESC:
Increase <style=cIsUtility>jump height</style>. Remove <style=cIsUtility>fall damage</style>. Creates a <style=cIsDamage>5m-100m</style> radius <style=cIsDamage>kinetic explosion</style> on hitting the ground, dealing <style=cIsDamage>1000%-10000%</style> base damage that scales up with <style=cIsDamage>fall distance</style>. Recharges in <style=cIsDamage>10</style> <style=cStack>(-50% per stack, Exponential)</style> seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_FEATHER_DESC: Gain <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> maximum <style=cIsUtility>jump count</style>.
strings.ITEM_FIREBALLSONHIT_DESC:
<style=cIsDamage>10%</style> chance on hit to call forth <style=cIsDamage>3 magma balls</style> from an enemy, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> <style=cStack>(+300% per stack, Linear)</style> TOTAL damage and <style=cIsDamage>igniting</style> all enemies.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.7/hit</style>
strings.ITEM_FIRERING_DESC: Hits that deal <style=cIsDamage>more than 400% damage</style> also blasts enemies with a <style=cIsDamage>runic flame tornado</style>, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> <style=cStack>(+300% per stack, Linear)</style> TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>10</style> seconds.
strings.ITEM_FIREWORK_DESC:
Activating an interactable <style=cIsDamage>launches 8 <style=cStack>(+4 per stack, Linear)</style> fireworks</style> that deal <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> base damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.2</style>
strings.ITEM_FLATHEALTH_DESC: Increases <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>25</style> <style=cStack>(+25 per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_FOCUSEDCONVERGENCE_DESC: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack, Linear) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack, Hyperbolic) smaller. Teleporter Charge Time0 Stacks = 90 Seconds 1 Stack = 69.2 Seconds 2 Stacks = 56.2 Seconds 3+ Stacks = 47.3 Seconds This item has a hard cap of 3 in effect across all players
strings.ITEM_FOCUSEDCONVERGENCE_PICKUP: Increase the speed of Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> charging... <color=#FF7F7F>BUT reduce the size of the zone</color>.
strings.ITEM_FRAGILEDAMAGEBONUSCONSUMED_DESC:
A spent item with no remaining power.

<color=#FF7F7F>No watches?</color>
strings.ITEM_FRAGILEDAMAGEBONUSCONSUMED_PICKUP:
...well, it's still right twice a day.

<color=#FF7F7F>No watches?</color>
strings.ITEM_FRAGILEDAMAGEBONUS_DESC: Increase damage by <style=cIsDamage>20%</style> <style=cStack>(+20% per stack, Linear)</style>. Taking damage to below <style=cIsHealth>25% health</style> <style=cIsUtility>breaks</style> this item.
strings.ITEM_FREECHEST_DESC:
A <style=cIsUtility>delivery</style> containing 2 items (79%/<style=cIsHealing>20%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>1%</style>) will appear in a random location <style=cIsUtility>on each stage</style>. <style=cStack>(Increases rarity chances of the items per stack, Special)</style>.

<style=cKeywordName>Stacking Info</style><style=cSub>4 stacks = (</style>45%<style=cSub>/<style=cIsHealing>46%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>9%</style>)
10 stacks = (</style>21%<style=cSub>/<style=cIsHealing>53%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>26%</style>)
20 stacks = (</style>9%<style=cSub>/<style=cIsHealing>45.5%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>45.5%</style>)
Any stacks above 20 makes <style=cIsHealth>Legendary items</style> most likely to spawn.</style>
strings.ITEM_GHOSTONKILL_DESC: Killing enemies has a <style=cIsDamage>7%</style> chance to <style=cIsDamage>spawn a ghost</style> of the killed enemy with <style=cIsDamage>1500%</style> damage. Lasts <style=cIsDamage>30s</style> <style=cStack>(+30s per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_GOLDONHIT_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>30% chance on hit</style> to gain <style=cIsUtility>gold</style> equal to <style=cIsUtility>8%</style> <style=cStack>(+8% per stack, Linear)</style> the cost of a <style=cIsDamage>Small Chest</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Scales with chests.</style>

On taking damage, <style=cIsHealth>lose gold</style> to the attacker equal to <style=cIsHealth>100%<style=cStack> (+100% per stack, Linear)</style></style> of the <style=cIsHealth>maximum health percentage you lost</style>.
strings.ITEM_GOLDONHURT_DESC:
Gain <style=cIsUtility>gold</style> equal to <style=cIsUtility>12%</style> <style=cStack>(+12% per stack, Linear)</style> the cost of a <style=cIsDamage>Small Chest</style> on <style=cIsDamage>taking damage</style> from an enemy. <style=cIsUtility>Scales with chests.</style>

<style=cKeywordName>Stacking Info</style><style=cSub><style=cStack>4 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>48% Gold for </style><style=cIsDamage>Small Chest</style>
<style=cStack>9 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>108% Gold for </style><style=cIsDamage>Small Chest</style>
<style=cStack>17 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>102% Gold for </style><style=cIsDamage>Large Chest</style>
strings.ITEM_GOLDONSTAGESTART_DESC:
During boss events, <style=cIsUtility>5</style> missiles bombard the area, dealing <style=cIsDamage>2.5% <style=cStack>(+2.5% per stack, Linear)</style> of boss' Max Health in damage</style>. Before the boss event, gain additional missiles, up to a maximum of <style=cIsUtility>20</style> <style=cStack>(+5 per stack, Linear)</style>, per <style=cIsUtility>50</style> gold gained. <style=cIsUtility>Gold requirement scales over time.</style>
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0</style>
strings.ITEM_HALFATTACKSPEEDHALFCOOLDOWNS_DESC: Decrease <style=cIsUtility>skill cooldowns</style> by <style=cIsUtility>50% <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style></style>. <style=cIsHealth>Decrease</style> <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style> <style=cIsHealth>by</style> <style=cIsDamage>50%</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style>.
strings.ITEM_HALFSPEEDDOUBLEHEALTH_DESC: Increase <style=cIsHealing>max health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>100% <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style></style>. Reduce <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>50%</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style>.
strings.ITEM_HEADHUNTER_DESC: Gain the <style=cIsDamage>power</style> of any killed elite monster for <style=cIsDamage>8s</style> <style=cStack>(+5s per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_HEALINGPOTIONCONSUMED_PICKUP: An empty container for an Elixir. Does nothing. Find a seller that sells weaker potions.
strings.ITEM_HEALONCRIT_DESC: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack, Linear) health. Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the amount of healing received by this item. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 8 health into 4 health.
strings.ITEM_HEALWHILESAFE_DESC: Increases <style=cIsHealing>base health regeneration</style> by <style=cIsHealing>+3 hp/s</style> <style=cStack>(+3 hp/s per stack, Linear)</style> after <style=cIsDamage>7</style> seconds of not taking damage.
strings.ITEM_HOOF_DESC: Increases <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>14%</style> <style=cStack>(+14% per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_ICERING_DESC: Hits that deal <style=cIsDamage>more than 400% damage</style> also blasts enemies with a <style=cIsDamage>runic ice blast</style>, <style=cIsUtility>slowing</style> them by <style=cIsUtility>80%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>3s</style> <style=cStack>(+3s per stack, Linear)</style> and dealing <style=cIsDamage>250%</style> <style=cStack>(+250% per stack, Linear)</style> TOTAL damage. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>10</style> seconds.
strings.ITEM_ICICLE_DESC:
Killing an enemy surrounds you with an <style=cIsDamage>ice storm</style> that deals <style=cIsDamage>1200% damage per second</style> and <style=cIsUtility>slows</style> enemies by <style=cIsUtility>80%</style> for <style=cIsUtility>1.5s</style>. The storm <style=cIsDamage>grows with every kill</style>, increasing its radius by <style=cIsDamage>2m</style>. Stacks up to <style=cIsDamage>18m</style> <style=cStack>(+12m per stack, Linear)</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.2</style>
strings.ITEM_IGNITEONKILL_DESC: Killing an enemy <style=cIsDamage>ignites</style> all enemies within <style=cIsDamage>12m</style> <style=cStack>(+4m per stack, Linear)</style> for <style=cIsDamage>150%</style> base damage. Additionally, enemies <style=cIsDamage>burn</style> for <style=cIsDamage>150%</style> <style=cStack>(+75% per stack, Linear)</style> base damage.
strings.ITEM_IMMUNETODEBUFF_DESC: Prevents <style=cIsUtility>1 <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style></style> <style=cIsDamage>debuff</style> and instead grants a <style=cIsHealing>temporary barrier</style> for <style=cIsHealing>10%</style> of <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style>. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>5</style> seconds.</style>.
strings.ITEM_INCREASEDAMAGEONMULTIKILL_DESC: Killing an enemy increases your damage by <style=cIsDamage>3.5%</style> <style=cStack>(+1% per stack, Linear)</style>, up to <style=cIsUtility>10</style> <style=cStack>(+5 per stack, Linear)</style>, for <style=cIsUtility>7s</style>. Dealing damage refreshes the timer.
strings.ITEM_INCREASEPRIMARYDAMAGE_DESC: Activating <style=cIsUtility>Secondary skill</style> stores up to <style=cIsUtility>5 charges</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style>. Requires <style=cIsUtility>3 charges</style> for your <style=cIsUtility>Primary skill</style> to fire lightning strikes, dealing <style=cIsDamage>175% TOTAL damage</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Linear)</style> each. <style=cIsUtility>Reduces Secondary skill cooldown by 20%</style>.
strings.ITEM_INFUSION_DESC:
Killing an enemy increases your <style=cIsHealing>health permanently</style> by <style=cIsHealing>1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style>, up to a <style=cIsHealing>maximum</style> of <style=cIsHealing>100 <style=cStack>(+100 per stack, Linear)</style> health</style>.

<style=cKeywordName>Stacking Info</style><style=cSub><style=cStack>2 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>+2 </style><style=cIsHealing>Health Per Kill</style>
<style=cStack>5 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>+5 </style><style=cIsHealing>Health Per Kill</style>
<style=cStack>50 Stacks</style> = <style=cIsUtility>+50 </style><style=cIsHealing>Health Per Kill</style></style>
strings.ITEM_INTERSTELLARDESKPLANT_DESC:
On kill, plant a <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> fruit seed that grows into a plant after <style=cIsUtility>5</style> seconds. 

The plant <style=cIsHealing>heals</style> for <style=cIsHealing>5%</style> of <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> every 0.5 seconds to all allies within <style=cIsHealing>10m</style> <style=cStack>(+5.0m per stack, Linear)</style>. Lasts <style=cIsUtility>10</style> seconds.
strings.ITEM_JUMPBOOST_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Jumping</style> while <style=cIsUtility>sprinting</style> boosts you forward by <style=cIsUtility>10m</style> <style=cStack>(+10m per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_KILLELITEFRENZY_DESC: Upon killing an elite monster, <style=cIsDamage>enter a frenzy</style> for <style=cIsDamage>4s</style> <style=cStack>(+4s per stack, Linear)</style> where <style=cIsUtility>skills have 0.5s cooldowns</style>.
strings.ITEM_KNOCKBACKHITENEMIES_DESC: Grounded enemies hit with any <style=cIsUtility>skill</style> are <style=cIsUtility>launched</style> and <style=cIsUtility>stunned</style>. Enemies hit while airborne are <style=cIsUtility>launched</style> again up to <style=cIsUtility>2 times</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style>. Launched enemies take increased damage by <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> from all sources per launch. Recharges after <style=cIsUtility>15s</style>.
strings.ITEM_KNURL_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>Increase maximum health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>40</style> <style=cStack>(+40 per stack, Linear)</style> and <style=cIsHealing>base health regeneration</style> by <style=cIsHealing>+1.6 hp/s<style=cStack>(+1.6 hp/s per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_LASERTURBINE_DESC:
Killing <style=cIsDamage>4</style> enemies in <style=cIsUtility>7 seconds</style> charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> base damage <style=cStack>(+300% per stack, Linear)</style>, piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for <style=cIsDamage>1000%</style> base damage <style=cStack>(+1000% per stack, Linear)</style>. Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> base damage <style=cStack>(+300% per stack, Linear)</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_LIGHTNINGSTRIKEONHIT_DESC:
<style=cIsDamage>10%</style> chance on hit to call down a lightning strike, dealing <style=cIsDamage>500%</style> <style=cStack>(+500% per stack, Linear)</style> damage.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_LOWERPRICEDCHESTS_DESC: Gain an extra item on the first chest opened per stage. Each additional Sale Star increases the chance of getting more items by 5%. Stacking InfoEach additional stack increases the TOTAL number of items you could gain from the first chest, and is re-rolled for each individual item seperately. You can think of it as rolling a 20-sided-die once per additonal stack. Each time you get a 20 on the die, you gain one aditional item. < ! > This explanation assumes you do not have any changes to your luck stat!
strings.ITEM_LUNARBADLUCK_DESC:
All skill cooldowns are reduced by <style=cIsUtility>2</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds. All random effects are rolled <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> times for an <style=cIsHealth>unfavorable outcome</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>This behaves in the same way as Disadvantage Rolls in D&D, however there is no cap to the amount extra die that can be rolled, thus stacks of this item = the number of extra die rolls. Advantage (<style=cIsHealth>57 Leaf Clover</style>) and Disadvantage (<style=cIsLunar>Purity</style>) cancel eachother out.</style>
strings.ITEM_LUNARDAGGER_DESC: Increase base damage by <style=cIsDamage>100%</style> <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Exponential)</style>. <style=cIsHealth>Decrease</style> <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>50%</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Exponential)</style>. <style=cIsHealth>Removes One-Shot Protection</style>.
strings.ITEM_LUNARPRIMARYREPLACEMENT_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Replace your Primary Skill</style> with <style=cIsUtility>Hungering Gaze</style>. 

Fire a flurry of <style=cIsUtility>tracking shards</style> that detonate after a delay, dealing <style=cIsDamage>120%</style> base damage. Hold up to 12 charges <style=cStack>(+12 per stack, Linear)</style> that reload after 2 seconds <style=cStack>(+2 per stack, Linear)</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Explosion Proc: 1 | Initial hit: 0.1</style>
strings.ITEM_LUNARSECONDARYREPLACEMENT_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Replace your Secondary Skill </style> with <style=cIsUtility>Slicing Maelstrom</style>. 

Charge up a projectile that deals <style=cIsDamage>5x175% damage per second</style> to nearby enemies, exploding after <style=cIsUtility>3</style> seconds to deal <style=cIsDamage>700% damage</style> and <style=cIsDamage>root</style> enemies for <style=cIsUtility>3</style> <style=cStack>(+3 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds. Recharges after 5 <style=cStack>(+5 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Maelstrom Proc: 0.2 | Explosion Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_LUNARSPECIALREPLACEMENT_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Replace your Special Skill</style> with <style=cIsUtility>Ruin</style>. 

Dealing damage adds a stack of <style=cIsDamage>Ruin</style> for 10 <style=cStack>(+10 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds. Activating the skill <style=cIsDamage>detonates</style> all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style> plus <style=cIsDamage>120% damage per stack of Ruin</style>. Recharges after 8 <style=cStack>(+8 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_LUNARSUN_DESC:
Every <style=cIsUtility>3</style><style=cStack>(-50% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style> seconds, gain an <style=cIsDamage>orbiting bomb</style> that detonates on impact for <style=cIsDamage>360%</style> damage, up to a maximum of <style=cIsUtility>3<style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> bombs</style>. Every <style=cIsUtility>60</style> seconds, a random item is <style=cIsUtility>converted</style> into this item.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_LUNARUTILITYREPLACEMENT_DESC:
<style=cIsUtility>Replace your Utility Skill</style> with <style=cIsUtility>Shadowfade</style>. 

Fade away, becoming <style=cIsUtility>intangible</style> and gaining <style=cIsUtility>+30% movement speed</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Heal</style> for <style=cIsHealing>+18.2% <style=cStack>(+18.2% per stack, Linear)</style> of your maximum health</style>. Lasts 3 <style=cStack>(+3 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
strings.ITEM_MEDKIT_DESC: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack, Linear) of maximum health. Stacking InfoAt 20 Stacks, receiving Medkit healing will fully recover the player's health. The number required to do this is reduced by having any Rejuvenation Racks
strings.ITEM_METEORATTACKONHIGHDAMAGE_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>3%</style> chance on hit to call a meteor strike, dealing <style=cIsDamage>2000%</style> base damage. Every <style=cIsDamage>100%</style> attack damage dealt increases the activation chance by <style=cIsDamage>3%</style> <style=cStack>(+3% per stack, Linear)</style> and damage by <style=cIsDamage>150%</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_MINORCONSTRUCTONKILL_DESC: Killing elite monsters spawns an <style=cIsDamage>Alpha Construct</style> with bonus <style=cIsDamage>300%</style> damage and <style=cIsHealing>300% health</style>. Limited to <style=cIsUtility>4</style> <style=cStack>(+4 per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_MISSILEVOID_DESC:
Gain a <style=cIsHealing>shield</style> equal to <style=cIsHealing>10%</style> of your maximum health. While you have a <style=cIsHealing>shield</style>, hitting an enemy fires a missile that deals <style=cIsDamage>40%</style> <style=cStack>(+40% per stack, Linear)</style> TOTAL damage. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all AtG Missile Mk. 1s</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.2</style>
strings.ITEM_MISSILE_DESC: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack, Linear) TOTAL damage. Proc: 1 Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the chance to activate this item on hit. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 10% Chance into 5% Chance.
strings.ITEM_MONSTERSONSHRINEUSE_DESC: Using a Shrine summons <style=cIsHealth>enemies</style> <style=cStack>(Stronger per stack similar to mountain shrine, Linear)</style> nearby. <style=cIsUtility>Scales over time.</style>
strings.ITEM_MOREMISSILE_DESC: All missile items and equipment fire an additional <style=cIsDamage>2</style> <style=cIsDamage>missiles</style>. Increase missile damage by <style=cIsDamage>0%</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Linear)</style>
strings.ITEM_MOVESPEEDONKILL_DESC: Killing an enemy increases <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>125%</style>, fading over <style=cIsUtility>1</style> <style=cStack>(+0.5 per stack, Linear)</style> seconds.
strings.ITEM_MUSHROOMVOID_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>Heals</style> for <style=cIsHealing>2%</style> <style=cStack>(+2% per stack, Linear)</style> of your <style=cIsHealing>health</style> every second <style=cIsUtility>while sprinting</style>. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Bustling Fungi</style>.
strings.ITEM_MUSHROOM_DESC: After standing still for <style=cIsHealing>1</style> second, create a zone that <style=cIsHealing>heals</style> for <style=cIsHealing>4.5%</style> <style=cStack>(+2.25% per stack, Linear)</style> of the recipient's <style=cIsHealing>max health</style> every second to all allies within <style=cIsHealing>3.5m</style> <style=cStack>(+1.5m per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_NEARBYDAMAGEBONUS_DESC: Increase damage to enemies within <style=cIsDamage>13m</style> by <style=cIsDamage>20%</style> <style=cStack>(+20% per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_NOVAONHEAL_DESC:
Store <style=cIsHealing>100%</style> <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style> of healing as <style=cIsHealing>Soul Energy</style>. After your <style=cIsHealing>Soul Energy</style> reaches <style=cIsHealing>10%</style> of your <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style>, <style=cIsDamage>fire a skull</style> that deals <style=cIsDamage>250%</style> of your <style=cIsHealing>Soul Energy</style> as <style=cIsDamage>damage</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.2</style>
strings.ITEM_NOVAONLOWHEALTH_DESC:
Falling below <style=cIsHealth>25% health</style> causes you to explode, dealing <style=cIsDamage>6000% base damage</style>. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>30 / (2 </style><style=cStack>+ 1 per stack, Linear)</style> <style=cIsUtility>seconds</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_OUTOFCOMBATARMOR_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>Increase armor</style> by <style=cIsHealing>100</style> <style=cStack>(+100 per stack, Linear)</style> after <style=cIsDamage>7</style> seconds of not taking damage.
strings.ITEM_PARENTEGG_DESC: Heal from <style=cIsDamage>incoming damage</style> for <style=cIsHealing>15<style=cStack> (+15 per stack, Linear)</style></style>.
strings.ITEM_PEARL_DESC: Increases <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style> by <style=cIsHealing>10%</style> <style=cStack>(+10% per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_PERMANENTDEBUFFONHIT_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>100%</style> chance on hit to reduce <style=cIsDamage>armor</style> by <style=cIsDamage>2</style> <style=cStack>(+2 per stack, Linear)</style> <style=cIsDamage>permanently</style>.
strings.ITEM_PERSONALSHIELD_DESC: Gain a <style=cIsHealing>shield</style> equal to <style=cIsHealing>8%</style> <style=cStack>(+8% per stack, Linear)</style> of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.
strings.ITEM_PHASING_DESC: Falling below <style=cIsHealth>25% health</style> causes you to gain <style=cIsUtility>40% movement speed</style> and <style=cIsUtility>invisibility</style> for <style=cIsUtility>5s</style>. Recharges every <style=cIsUtility>30 seconds</style> <style=cStack>(-50% per stack, Exponential)</style>.
strings.ITEM_PRIMARYSKILLSHURIKEN_DESC:
Activating your <style=cIsUtility>Primary skill</style> also throws a <style=cIsDamage>shuriken</style> that deals <style=cIsDamage>400%</style> <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style> base damage. You can hold up to <style=cIsUtility>3</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> <style=cIsDamage>shurikens</style> which all reload over <style=cIsUtility>10</style> seconds.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_RANDOMDAMAGEZONE_DESC: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within <style=cIsUtility>16m</style> <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Exponential)</style>, causing them to deal <style=cIsDamage>+50%</style> damage.
strings.ITEM_RANDOMEQUIPMENTTRIGGER_DESC: Trigger a <style=cIsDamage>random equipment</style> effect <style=cIsDamage>1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> time(s).
strings.ITEM_RANDOMLYLUNAR_DESC: Items have a <style=cIsUtility>5% <style=cStack>(+5% per stack, Linear)</style></style> chance to become a <style=cIsLunar>Lunar</style> item instead.
strings.ITEM_REPEATHEAL_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>Heal +100%</style> <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style> more. <style=cIsHealing>All healing is applied over time</style>. Can <style=cIsHealing>heal</style> for a <style=cIsHealing>maximum</style> of <style=cIsHealing>10%</style> <style=cStack>(-50% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style> of your <style=cIsHealing>health per second</style>.
strings.ITEM_REPULSIONARMORPLATE_DESC: Reduce all <style=cIsDamage>incoming damage</style> by <style=cIsDamage>5<style=cStack> (+5 per stack, Linear)</style></style>. Cannot be reduced below <style=cIsDamage>1</style>.
strings.ITEM_ROBOBALLBUDDY_DESC: Every 30 seconds, <style=cIsUtility>summon two Solus Probes</style> that gain <style=cIsDamage>+100%</style> <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style> damage per <style=cIsUtility>ally on your team</style>.
strings.ITEM_SECONDARYSKILLMAGAZINE_DESC: Add <style=cIsUtility>+1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> charge of your <style=cIsUtility>Secondary skill</style>.
strings.ITEM_SEED_DESC: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack, Linear) health. Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the amount of healing received by this item. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 10 health into 5 health.
strings.ITEM_SHIELDONLY_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>Convert</style> all but <style=cIsHealing>1 health</style> into <style=cIsHealing>regenerating shields</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Gain 50% <style=cStack>(+25% per stack, Linear)</style> maximum health</style>. <style=cIsHealing>Negates fall damage</style>.
strings.ITEM_SHINYPEARL_DESC: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack, Linear). ''All stats'' MeaningHealth, Movement Speed, Damage, Attack Speed, Crit Chance, and Armor Multiplier. Health regen gets a flat 0.1 (+0.02 per level) HP/s per stack, which is effectively a 10% increase on all characters but a small group.
strings.ITEM_SHOCKNEARBY_DESC:
Fire out <style=cIsDamage>lightning</style> that hits <style=cIsDamage>3</style> <style=cStack>(+2 per stack, Linear)</style> enemies for <style=cIsDamage>200%</style> base damage every <style=cIsDamage>0.5s</style>. The Tesla Coil switches off every <style=cIsDamage>10 seconds</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.3</style>
strings.ITEM_SIPHONONLOWHEALTH_DESC: While in combat, the nearest 1<style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> enemies to you within <style=cIsDamage>13m</style> will be 'tethered' to you, dealing <style=cIsDamage>100%</style> damage per second, applying <style=cIsDamage>tar</style>, and <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> you for <style=cIsHealing>100%</style> of the damage dealt.
strings.ITEM_SLOWONHITVOID_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>5%</style> <style=cStack>(+5% per stack, Linear)</style> chance on hit to <style=cIsDamage>root</style> enemies for <style=cIsUtility>1s</style> <style=cStack>(+1s per stack, Linear)</style>. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Chronobaubles</style>.
strings.ITEM_SLOWONHIT_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Slow</style> enemies on hit for <style=cIsUtility>-60% movement speed</style> for <style=cIsUtility>2s</style> <style=cStack>(+2s per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_SPEEDBOOSTPICKUP_DESC: Spawns orbs of energy nearby every <style=cIsUtility>10s</style> <style=cStack>(-10% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style>, giving <style=cIsUtility>+12% movement speed</style> up to <style=cIsUtility>3</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> <style=cIsUtility>times</style> for <style=cIsUtility>12s</style>.
strings.ITEM_SPRINTARMOR_DESC: <style=cIsHealing>Increase armor</style> by <style=cIsHealing>30</style> <style=cStack>(+30 per stack, Linear)</style> <style=cIsUtility>while sprinting</style>.
strings.ITEM_SPRINTBONUS_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Sprint speed</style> is improved by <style=cIsUtility>25%</style> <style=cStack>(+25% per stac, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_SPRINTOUTOFCOMBAT_DESC: Leaving combat boosts your <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>30%</style> <style=cStack>(+30% per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_SPRINTWISP_DESC:
Fire a <style=cIsDamage>tracking wisp</style> for <style=cIsDamage>300% <style=cStack>(+300% per stack, Linear)</style> damage</style>. Fires every <style=cIsUtility>1.6</style> seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style>.
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 1</style>
strings.ITEM_SQUIDTURRET_DESC: Activating an interactable summons a <style=cIsDamage>Squid Turret</style> that attacks nearby enemies at <style=cIsDamage>100% <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style> attack speed</style>. Lasts <style=cIsUtility>30</style> seconds.
strings.ITEM_STICKYBOMB_DESC: 5% (+5% per stack, Linear) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage. Stacking Info20 Stacks result in 100% chance to apply The above assumes a Proc Coefficient of 1.0 triggers the event. Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the chance to activate this item on hit. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 5% Chance into 2.5% Chance.
strings.ITEM_STRENGTHENBURN_DESC: Ignite effects instead inflict a <style=cIsDamage>Stronger Burn</style> which deals <style=cIsDamage>+300%</style> <style=cStack>(+300% per stack, Linear)</style> more damage over time than Ignite.
strings.ITEM_STUNANDPIERCE_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>15%</style> chance on hit to fire an electric boomerang that slices through enemies dealing <style=cIsDamage>120% base damage</style> and deals an additional <style=cIsDamage>120%</style> <style=cStack>(+120% per stack, Linear)</style> <style=cIsDamage>base damage per second</style> and <style=cIsDamage>stuns</style> all enemies hit. Can <style=cIsDamage>strike</style> enemies on the way back.
strings.ITEM_STUNCHANCEONHIT_DESC: 5% (+5% per stack, Hyperbolic) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds. Stacking Info5 Stacks = 20% 10 Stacks = 33.3% 20 Stacks = 50% The above assumes a Proc Coefficient of 1.0 triggers the event. Proc Coefficient EffectsProc Coefficient changes the chance to activate this item on hit. For example, a Proc Coefficient of 0.5 turns 5% Chance into 2.5% Chance.
strings.ITEM_SYRINGE_DESC: Increases <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style> by <style=cIsDamage>15% <style=cStack>(+15% per stack, Linear)</style></style>.
strings.ITEM_TALISMAN_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Kills reduce</style> <style=cIsUtility>equipment cooldown</style> by <style=cIsUtility>4s</style> <style=cStack>(+2s per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_THORNS_DESC:
Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing <style=cIsDamage>160% damage</style>. Hits up to <style=cIsDamage>5</style> <style=cStack>(+2 per stack, Linear)</style> targets in a <style=cIsDamage>25m</style> <style=cStack>(+10m per stack, Linear)</style> radius
<style=cKeywordName>Proc: 0.5</style>
strings.ITEM_TITANGOLDDURINGTP_DESC: Summon <style=cIsDamage>Aurelionite</style> during the teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> event. It has <style=cIsDamage>100% <style=cStack>(+50% per stack, Linear)</style> damage</style> and <style=cIsHealing>100% <style=cStack>(+100% per stack, Linear)</style> health</style>.
strings.ITEM_TONICAFFLICTION_DESC: Reduces ALL stats by <style=cIsHealth>-5%</style> <style=cStack>(-5% per stack)</style>
strings.ITEM_TONICAFFLICTION_PICKUP: <color=#FF7F7F>Reduce ALL stats when not under the effects of Spinel Tonic by 5%</color><style=cStack>(+5% per stack, Exponential)</style>.
strings.ITEM_TOOTH_DESC: Killing an enemy spawns a <style=cIsHealing>healing orb</style> that heals for <style=cIsHealing>8</style> plus an additional <style=cIsHealing>2% <style=cStack>(+2% per stack, Linear)</style></style> of <style=cIsHealing>maximum health</style>.
strings.ITEM_TPHEALINGNOVA_DESC: Release a <style=cIsHealing>healing nova </style>during the Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> event, <style=cIsHealing>healing</style> all nearby allies for <style=cIsHealing>50%</style> of their maximum health. Occurs <style=cIsHealing>1</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> times.
strings.ITEM_TREASURECACHEVOID_PICKUP: Gain access to an Encrusted Cache that contains a void item. (41.66%/<style=cIsHealing>41.66%</style>/<style=cIsHealth>16.66%</style>) <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all Rusted Keys</style>.
strings.ITEM_TRIGGERENEMYDEBUFFS_DESC: Gain <style=cIsDamage>10%</style> chance to <style=cIsDamage>bleed</style> an enemy. On killing an enemy, <style=cIsDamage>transfer 33%</style> of every debuff stack to <style=cIsDamage>1 enemy</style> <style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> within <style=cIsUtility>20m</style> <style=cStack>(+5m per stack, Linear)</style>.
strings.ITEM_UTILITYSKILLMAGAZINE_DESC: Add <style=cIsUtility>+2</style> <style=cStack>(+2 per stack, Linear)</style> charges of your <style=cIsUtility>Utility skill</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Reduces Utility skill cooldown</style> by <style=cIsUtility>33%</style>.
strings.ITEM_VOIDMEGACRABITEM_DESC: Every <style=cIsUtility>60</style><style=cStack>(-50% per stack, Hyperbolic)</style> seconds, gain a random <style=cIsVoid>Void</style> ally. Can have up to <style=cIsUtility>1</style><style=cStack>(+1 per stack, Linear)</style> allies at a time.
strings.ITEM_VOIDMEGACRABITEM_PICKUP: Periodically recruit allies from the <style=cIsVoid>Void</style>. <style=cIsVoid>Corrupts all </style><style=cIsTierBoss>yellow items</style><style=cIsVoid></style>.
strings.ITEM_WARCRYONMULTIKILL_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Killing 4 enemies</style> within <style=cIsDamage>1</style> second sends you into a <style=cIsDamage>frenzy</style> for <style=cIsDamage>6s</style> <style=cStack>(+4s per stack, Linear)</style>. Increases <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsUtility>50%</style> and <style=cIsDamage>attack speed</style> by <style=cIsDamage>100%</style>.
strings.ITEM_WARDONLEVEL_DESC: On <style=cIsUtility>level up</style> or starting the <style=cIsUtility>Teleporter <sprite name="TP" tint=1> event</style>, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within <style=cIsUtility>16m</style> <style=cStack>(+8m per stack, Linear)</style>. Raise <style=cIsDamage>attack</style> and <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> by <style=cIsDamage>30%</style>.
